caption.p: PCA2 biplot along the two principal components; associating opponent species (LhC: Linepithema humile colonizer, LhR: L. humile resident; Ln: facing Lasius neglectus, Lni: facing Lasius niger) with fourteen variables reflecting aggressiveness of L. humile and strength of the competition with the opponent species (n = 48; ellipses confidence intervals of 0.9; large points = mean points of groups (barycenters)).
